serv_freq: mean trips per day and station [trips/day]
serv_dur: mean time of service availabilty [% of day]
coverage: population in 5 min walking distance to public transport [%]
pop_near_park: population within walking distance to parks [%]
accessibility_poi_sum_restrnts_iso_bicyc: restaurants accessible by bike in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_shopping_iso_bicyc: shopping accessible by bike in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_business_iso_bicyc: businesses accessible by bike in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_eduinsts_iso_bicyc: educations accessible by bike in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_restrnts_iso_walk_: restaurants accessible by walking in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_shopping_iso_walk_: shopping accessible by walking in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_business_iso_walk_: businesses accessible by walking in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_eduinsts_iso_walk_: educations accessible by walking in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_restrnts_iso_drive: restaurants accessible by car in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_shopping_iso_drive: shopping accessible by car in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_business_iso_drive: businesses accessible by car in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_eduinsts_iso_drive: educations accessible by car in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_restrnts_iso_appro: restaurants accessible by public transport in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_shopping_iso_appro: shopping accessible by public transport in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_business_iso_appro: businesses accessible by public transport in 5 min
accessibility_poi_sum_eduinsts_iso_appro: educations accessible by public transport in 5 min
